## withDisposableCancel() function

Run a [CancellableTask](./race-cancellation.cancellabletask.md) function with a [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) adapted from a [DisposableCancelExecutor](./race-cancellation.disposablecancelexecutor.md) function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function withDisposableCancel<TResult>(cancellableTask: CancellableTask<TResult>, cancelExecutor: DisposableCancelExecutor, outerRaceCancel?: RaceCancel): Promise<TResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cancellableTask | [CancellableTask](./race-cancellation.cancellabletask.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; | a [CancellableTask](./race-cancellation.cancellabletask.md) function |
|  cancelExecutor | [DisposableCancelExecutor](./race-cancellation.disposablecancelexecutor.md) | a [DisposableCancelExecutor](./race-cancellation.disposablecancelexecutor.md) function will only be called once |
|  outerRaceCancel | [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) | an optional outer [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) function that will be composed with the inner [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) function. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TResult&gt;
